attributes.action: We need to spread awareness and stop using the precious fossil fuels that are incresingly running out!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hope to help advertise the affects of global warming. it has become an increasing problem and not enough people are aware of it. I hope to increase awarness and help people to understand what can be done. Everyone can help but they need to know the truth about the reality of global warming!
